alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:14AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following counties, Harnett and Wake. * WHEN...Until 115 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Areal flooding continues around Fuquay-Varina area including road closures at NC-55 and Delaney Hills Ln, and where Holland Road intersects Mayfair Wood Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1011 AM EDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Holly Springs, Duncan, Raven Rock State Park and Lake Benson. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
